content: वेणिः --णी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [वेण्-इन्-वा ङीप् <ls>Uṇ. 4. 18</ls>] {@--1@} Braided hair, a braid of hair; तरंगिणी वेणिरिवायता भुवः <ls>Śi. 12. 75</ls>; <ls>Me. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Hair twisted into a single unornamented braid and allowed to fall on the back (said to be worn by women whose husbands are absent from them); वनान्निवृत्तेन रघूत्तमेन मुक्ता स्वयं वेणिरिवाबभासे <ls>R. 14. 12</ls>; अबलावेणिमोक्षोत्सुकानि <ls>Me. 99</ls>, <ls>Ku. 2. 61.</ls> {@--3@} Continuous flow, current, stream; जलवेणिरम्यां रेवां यदि प्रेक्षितुमस्ति कामः <ls>R. 6. 43</ls>; <ls>Me. 20</ls>; प्रवृत्तबाष्पवेणिकं चक्षुः प्रमृज्य <ls>K.</ls>, <ab>cf.</ab> the word त्रिवेणि also. {@--4@} The confluence of two or more rivers. {@--5@} The confluence of the Ganges, Yamunā and Sarasvatī. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river.
